phrases: Akemi-san has a kind of mysterious aura about her.
The reality of the destruction around us fills our mind
The raging rain sounds like a storm of tears
that your eyes were given to you to acknowledge others,
that your eyes were given to you to acknowledge others,
that your eyes were given to you to acknowledge others,
that your eyes were given to you to acknowledge others,
that your eyes were given to you to acknowledge others,
that your voice was given to you to tell others how you feel
All living things
bear witness to my song
Your heart contains all its truth
Even when all you see in your path are storms
remember that your strength is no coincidence
Hey, it even swallowed up the Diet Building!
It is practically right in our faces now!
What should we do?
In another week, this place will be...
What are you doing?
Mr. President!
What happens if the enemy takes us by surprise
because you took your minds off observation duties?
Would you take responsibility for the casualties?
What is his problem?
Secret Service, take them to the disciplinary cells.
Yes, Sir.
Seriously?!
Screw you!
Where do you get off
I can do whatever I want with this, you know!
If you do not like the sound of that, then obey me!
You are not sleeping yet?
I cannot sleep at a time like this.
There is only one week left until the Exodus.
And...
Gai would not be idling before an operation.
The leader of the Undertakers?
Did he threaten his members into doing what he wanted?
What is this about?
There is resentment building amongst the students.
You are going too far, Shu.
So what if they resent us?
They all want to be safe as soon as possible, right?
When Hare...
That happened to her because there was no discipline.
I know it was probably the people who resent us that attacked Arisa,
but there is no going back now.
You said it yourself, Yahiro.
Of course, we still need ways to ensure that they do not feel oppressed.
S-Someone help!
Inori?
What is wrong?
It is nothing.
I am fine.
Someone help me...
Hello?
Yes.
The student body is on the verge of collapse.
Yes, Ouma's keeping them in check with his power for now...
Criticizing President Ouma is not allowed, even for a Rank S like you.
Who were you talking to?
If you do not want to tell me, that is fine.
I can easily find out just by looking at your call history.
All right.
Will you draw it out, then?
My...
Void...
You sure about this, Nanba?
Yeah.
I already received an advance payment, after all.
Well, I guess this means it is about time.
Here goes.
Hey, what is this about?!
Ouma
Shu's hiding it,
but if your Void breaks...
What the hell?
He is hidden that from us to use our Voids?!
This is unforgivable...
He is going to pay for this!
Drop dead, Shu!
Go to hell!
A total of ninety-eight cover-ups and fabrications have been unearthed
in the reports from the Japanese government.
I knew it was a mistake to entrust this to Keido.
We have been reaching out to them for almost a decade now...
Do not you think we have done enough?
You want to abandon them?
The YOU.N. would exchange the defunct Japanese yen at a fixed rate.
In that case...
Now that your representatives have reached an accord,
let us hear the details of your plan.
It is not very nice to spread idle rumors.
Rumors?
The rumor that if your Void breaks, you die.
Are you sure that is not the truth, rather than a just a rumor?
It is a rumor.
If it was not, our whole establishment would break down.
So you have come to silence me this time?
This time?
Anyone who defies your establishment is punished.
Is not that what you have come to say?
We would never order something like that.
I see.
Let me tell you who did it, then.
Penalty?
For the sin of trampling all over people's hearts...
Then I would pay for it, too.
Why would you say that?
I am probably the one who hurt Kuhouin.
What are you talking about?
I thought she was about to cause trouble for you, Shu.
It made me shudder inside...
and I probably...
I am afraid of myself.
Because I am a monster...
It is okay.
Do not worry.
In this school, I am the king.
I will never let anyone hurt you.
Shu.
I found out who attacked Kuhouin Arisa.
Who was it?
Yuzuriha Inori.
I have testimony from an eyewitness.
I see.
So?
You are too hung up on Yuzuriha, Shu.
If we allow special treatment, we will lose control of the students.
If an enforcer of the rules breaks them
Shut up!
Were not you the one who kept the details of Void death from me?!
You have kept just as many secrets as she has!
Stop it, Shu!
Do not you get it?
It was to keep everyone alive!
Liar!
Do not try to brush this off.
You think I am an idiot, so you are just trying to use me!
That is not it!
I figured something out after what happened to June
People make a lot of mistakes.
Correcting those mistakes requires power.
That made me think that I needed to work with you!
You expect me to believe that?
I know you are planning to sell me out eventually,
Sugar!
Yes, I am sure I sound like I am lying.
I suppose these are the consequences of my actions...
Get out of here, Yahiro.
You never thought of us as friends in the first place.
Is not that right?
Yes, that is right.
Samukawa was sent to the Rank F tents.
Like they say, you reap what you sow.
Also, have this.
It is what you asked for.
The date and time of the Exodus, and information on the students' Voids, too.
What do you intend to use it for?
A coup d'etat.
I am going to force the emperor and his new clothes out of power.
Move out, starting with the groups who are ready.
Our destination, Tokyo
Tower, is about four kilometers away.
We will take a break after each kilometer and do a roll call.
Regarding the details, follow your squad leader's orders.
There is something wrong with the mood today.
Kuhouin will give the signal.
We know.
Has Team B received the news?
Do not get the timing wrong.
Are we sure the Secret Service is with us on this?
Kanon?
Nanba.
Yes?
What does everyone think of me?
They are grateful to you, the leader who will free them all.
I see.
The students are on the move.
Just as the leaked plans said they would.
Are they headed for Tokyo Tower?
Yes, Sir.
Unless something changes, we will make contact with them on Sakurada Street.
I see.
So, we are about to witness the advent of the true king.
I have measured the maximum value of the genomic resonance in Tennozu.
The index variation is 281.
Honestly... you have done well, collecting them...
I will go over the plan one more time.
The machine controlling the Ghost Unit is here in Tokyo Tower.
I will use Voids to send a high-voltage current through its struts.
If I short the machine that way,
I should be able to render the Ghosts powerless.
You will create a path to get me there.
Go to your designated posts and hold back the enemy's defense Insects.
If we succeed, we will be able to get outside the wall.
Let us give it our all.
They are here!
Do not be afraid!
We have Voids on our side!
Let us move forward, Ouma.
Not for anyone else, but for our own futures!
Begin the operation!
There are twenty Auto-Insects, just like we expected.
Damn it!
Mr. President, the path is open.
Did I just use them as glorified decoys?
Shu...
Inori...
It is okay.
Do not worry.
This is not the time for soul-searching.
Kazumi!
Sir, where are you going?
Let us go!
I will do this.
I am doing this!
I do not...
Come, everyone.
Let us cross the red line while we can.
Quickly!
It is over, Inori.
Come on, let us follow them.
What is with you three?
What do you think you are doing?!
Shu!
Stay back, Inori!
You cannot go out there, Ayase!
Tsugumi?
Great work, Mr. President.
Your work is done now.
We will go on alone from here.
There you have it.
Arisa!
Did you do this?!
Do I really need to answer that?
I am not doing anything wrong...
I am not...
Souta?
How dare you use us as tools!
Who said you could peek inside my heart?!
Coward!
Parasite!
Drop dead!
We are sick of you!
Shu!
Hey!
Inori!
Inori!
Gai?!
You came for us.
Long time no see, Shu.
Shu...
My arm!
My king's power...!
We will now take a vote on United Nations Resolution 17,
the project to terminate Japan.
Approved by majority vote.
We will now proceed to drop the RM warheads.
King?
Have you forgotten?
You were just a usurper.
The king has always been me.
